Cloaking_Device.help: The Cloaking Device allows you to use an LCD body coating become partially invisible. While Cloaked you can only be seen at very close range. If you attack while Cloaked, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense. Unlike some stealth powers, the Cloaking Device has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow

Dragons_Tail.help: This low spinning kick deals the same damage as Thunder Kick, but has a chance to hit all enemies in melee range. Successful hits will trip and knock down your opponents. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Dragons_Tail.shortHelp: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knockback

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Quickness.help: Your Quick reflexes allow you to move faster than normal, as well as resist slow effects. This power is always on and permanently increases your attack rate and movement speed.
Quickness.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} has increased your rate of attack.

Elude.help: You can improve your reflexes, making yourself so quick you can Elude almost any attack, be it ranged, melee, or area effect. Your running speed and jumping height are also increased. When Elude wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to Recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Slow
Elude.targetHelp: You can improve your reflexes, making yourself so quick you can Elude almost any attack, be it ranged, melee, or area effect. Your running speed and jumping height are also increased. When Elude wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to Recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Slow
Elude.attackerHit: You are now extremely Elusive, and almost impossible to hit, however, you are too preoccupied to attack foes or assist his allies.

messages.attackerHit: {PowerName} has left you exhausted and unable to Recovery Endurance for a while!

Indomitable_Will.help: Activating this power greatly boosts your resistance to Sleep, Disorient, Fear and Hold effects for 90 seconds. Indomitable Will also grants a high defense to Psionic based attacks. Recharge: Very Long
Indomitable_Will.shortHelp: Self Res( Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear). DEF(Psionics)

Mind_Over_Body.help: When you toggle on this power, you empower your Mind Over Body to become highly resistant to Smashing, Lethal and Psionic damage. You must have Mental Blast or Indomitable Will before selecting this power. Recharge: Fast

Head_Splitter.help: Agent Indigo has lowered your defense with her blade.

Protective_Shield.help: Dramatically protects an ally from Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, and Negative Energy attacks for a limited time. Also reduces Toxic damage and protects the target from Endurance Draining effects.
Protective_Shield.shortHelp: Ranged, Ally +DEF(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Res(Toxic, End Drain)
Protective_Shield.targetHelp: You have been encased in a Protective Shield.
Protective_Shield.targetShortHelp: Ranged, Ally +DEF(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Res(Toxic, End Drain)

Dispersion_Bubble.help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Dispersion Bubble gives all allies within increased Defense against all attacks except Psionic. The Dispersion Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. Recharge: Slow
Dispersion_Bubble.targetHelp: The Dispersion Bubble is increasing your Defenses and providing protection from Hold, Immobilize and Disorienting attacks.
Dispersion_Bubble.victimHit: {PlayerSource} protects you from most damage types with a {PowerName}.

Detention_Field.help: Encases a targeted foe in a Detention Force Field. The captured target cannot be harmed, is Immobilized, and cannot attack or aid his allies. The target can, however, use powers on himself. Recharge: Slow
Detention_Field.targetHelp: You have been captured in a Detention Field. You cannot be harmed, however, you can only use powers which affect yourself.

Missile_Launcher.help: This devastating weapon has extreme range capabilities. Its slow recharge and high endurance cost is compensated by its massive explosion and Knockback.
Missile_Launcher.targetHelp: This devastating weapon has extreme range capabilities. Its slow recharge and high endurance cost is compensated by its massive explosion and Knockback.

Dispersion_Bubble.help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Dispersion Bubble gives all allies within increased Defense against all attacks except Psionic. The Dispersion Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. Recharge: Slow

Web_Grenade.targetHelp: The Special Ops soldier has snared you in their Web Grenade. You are Immobilized, cannot fly, and your attack speed is reduced.

EMP_Grenade.help: This grenade can unleash a massive pulse of electromagnetic energy on impact. This EMP can affect machines, and is even powerful enough to affect synaptic brain patterns. It will incapacitate all foes in its radius. Additionally, most machines and robots will take moderate high damage.
EMP_Grenade.shortHelp: PBAoE, Foe Hold, Special vs. Robots, -Endurance
EMP_Grenade.targetHelp: You are held immobile by the EMP Pulse Grenade, and your Regeneration Rate has been reduced.

Cloaking_Device.help: The Cloaking Device allows you to use an LCD body coating become partially invisible. While Cloaked you can only be seen at very close range. If you attack while Cloaked, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense. Unlike some stealth powers, the Cloaking Device has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow
Cloaking_Device.targetHelp: The Cloaking Device allows you to use an LCD body coating become partially invisible. While Cloaked you can only be seen at very close range. If you attack while Cloaked, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense. Unlike some stealth powers, the Cloaking Device has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow

Burst.help: Quickly fires a Burst of rounds at a single target at very long range. Damage is average, but the fire rate is fast. Can also reduce the target's defense. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Burst.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the Assault Rifle.

Slug.targetHelp: Fires a large slug at a single target at very long range. This very accurate weapon hits hard, and can knock down foes.

Full_Auto.help: Opens up your assault rifle on Full Auto to lay down a massive spray of bullets at your target. Although very slow to reload, damage from this attack is massive, shredding all targets within the narrow cone of effect. There's a chance you may land a lucky shot for extra damage. Damage: Superior(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Full_Auto.targetHelp: You are being rattled by a Full Auto hit from an Assault Rifle.

Leadership.help: A good leader knows how to lead his team. While active, this power increases the Defense, Damage and Accuracy of yourself and all nearby teammates. These advanced Tactics also protect the team from Confuse effects, as well as your Perception debuffs.

Leadership.victimHit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's Defense with good {PowerName}.

Dark_Matter_Detonation.shortHelp: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Negative), Foe Knockback, -Recharge, -SPD

Power_Drain.help: Using this power, you can drain the essence of all nearby foes' souls, thus increasing your own strength. Each affected foe will lose some Hit Points and add to your Damage and Accuracy. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long

Sonic_Grenade.help: The Disruption Arrow will weaken all targets in a radius around the target location's resistance to all damage types.

Entangle.help: Immobilizes your target by Entangling their feet in a twisted mass of thorny roots. The roots do smashing and lethal damage to the target over time. More resilient foes may require multiple applications to Immobilize. Entangle can immobilize flying targets, if they are near the ground when attacked. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Entangle.shortHelp: Ranged, Moderate DoT(Smashing, Lethal), Foe Immobilize
Entangle.targetHelp: The roots have Entangled you, crushing and cutting you. You are immobile and cannot fly.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Immobilizes you with their {PowerName}.

Strangler.help: Holds a distant foe by Strangling him with massive root-like vines. The target is held helpless, while he is slowly crushed by the vines. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Strangler.targetHelp: The Strangler Vine is crushing you and preventing you from acting.

messages.attackerHit: You Hold {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Holds you with their {PowerName}.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.

Roots.help: Immobilizes a group of foes by entangling their feet in a twisted mass of thorny Roots. Roots is slower and does less damage than Entangle, but it can capture multiple foes in one attack. Like Entangle, Roots can immobilize flying targets, if they are near the ground when attacked. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Roots.shortHelp: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DoT(Smashing, Lethal), Foe Immobilize
Roots.targetHelp: The Roots have entangled you. You are immobile and cannot fly.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Immobilizes you with their {PowerName}.

Spore_Burst.help: You hurl a large fungi pod at your foes. This pod is full of Spores that burst on impact, engulfing the target and all those around him. All affected targets may succumb to the narcotic effect of the Spores and will fall asleep. The targets will remain asleep for some time, but will awaken if attacked. Recharge: Slow
Spore_Burst.targetHelp: The Spore Burst has rendered you unconscious! Any damage will awaken you, however.

messages.attackerHit: You Sleep {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Sleeps you with their {PowerName}.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage.

Seeds_of_Confusion.help: You throw a handful of seeds from a rare Baffle plant at your foes. The seeds spread out in a wide cone and release a dusty chaff that contain a number of alkaloids and hallucinogenic compounds. Foes that come into contact with these seeds become violently confused and will turn and attack each other, ignoring you and all your allies. You will not receive any Experience Points for foes defeated entirely by Confused enemies. Recharge: Very Long
Seeds_of_Confusion.targetHelp: You are confused and may attack an incorrect target.

messages.attackerHit: You Confuse {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Confuses you with their {PowerName}.

Vines.help: Creates a field of Strangler Vines that can Hold multiple foes at range. The affected targets are held helpless by the massive root-like vines. Unlike the power Strangler, this power does not deal any damage, but it can Hold multiple foes at once. Recharge: Very Long
Vines.targetHelp: The Vines are Holding you and preventing you from acting.

messages.attackerHit: You Hold {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Holds you with their {PowerName}.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Carrion_Creepers.help: You can create a Creeper patch at a targeted location. The patch will snag foes, slowing their movement, and preventing them from jumping or flying. Additionally, a Creeper Vine will burst from under each live and defeated foe in the area and start attacking your enemies. Creeper Vines do minimal damage, but they can knock down your enemies and its poisonous thorns can slow your foes. Any foes that are defeated in the Creeper patch will also produce a growth of Entangle Roots that will Immobilize any enemies near the defeated foe. Recharge: Very Long

Fly_Trap.help: You can summon a giant carnivorous Fly Trap plant beast. Fly Trap may be an understatement, as this plant beast has a taste for flesh. The Fly Trap will viciously attack any nearby foes; biting, hurling poisonous Thorns and even casting its own Entangle Roots. The Fly Trap will fight by your side and can be healed and buffed like any teammate. Recharge: Very Long
Fly_Trap.shortHelp: Summon Fly Trap: Ranged Control Special
